name: Battle Clone
description:
A small clone of NES Namco's Battle City for the PC.

This project is only a poc to check if i could replicate a simple nes game just by watching gameplay videos.
So far, the player is fully functional, can fire and has audio.
I've tried to replicate the wall destruction system 1:1 but i'm yet to find the correct alghoritm.

How to Use:

[WASD] - Move

[SPACE] - Fire
